## Ed25519.verify() method

Verifies a RFC8032 EdDSA signature of given data with a given public key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static verify(options: {
        data: Uint8Array;
        key: Uint8Array;
        signature: Uint8Array;
    }): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { data: Uint8Array; key: Uint8Array; signature: Uint8Array; } | The options for the verification operation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A Promise that resolves to a boolean indicating whether the signature is valid.
